name: Anxiety Buster
description:
Stop the “out of control” anxious thoughts! Pop the the anxiety thought bubbles and absorb all the damage causing bullets, but be careful if you don’t time your shield right you may end up becoming anxious yourself!

Hit bullets with your shield up to absorb them. Hit bubbles with your shield down to pop them. Don't hit any bullets while your shield is down or you'll lose health!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - move and rotate
  • Spacebar - activate shield

Credits:

  • Art by @LyraGDark
  • Programming by @spsmith
